statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_interactions
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_datetime FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'complaint'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_datetime FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_datetime, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_datetime >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_phone ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customers.customer_name, interactions.interaction_date, interactions.interaction_type FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, notes FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT c.customer_name, i.interaction_date, i.notes FROM customers c INNER JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'Call'
SELECT feedback_id, satisfaction_level, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE satisfaction_level > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_phone = '123456789';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_history_id, interaction_status, interaction_resolved_date FROM interactions_history WHERE interaction_status = 'Closed' ORDER BY interaction_resolved_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date, rating FROM Feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Order WHERE total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders, customer_id FROM Order GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 3;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
